author: Michael R.
text: Absolutely incredible work! They came to my home in Summerlin and made my Tesla Model 3 look better than the day I bought it. The ceramic coating is phenomenal — water just beads right off. Highly recommend!

author: Sarah K.
text: We have two kids and a dog — our BMW X5 interior was a disaster. These guys performed a miracle. Every stain gone, smells fresh, leather looks brand new. Will be a regular customer for sure.

author: James P.
text: Best detailing service in Las Vegas, hands down. I've tried 4 different companies over the years and LV Mobile Detailing is on another level. Professional, thorough, and fair pricing.

author: Lisa M.
text: My Porsche 911 had terrible swirl marks from a previous 'detail' at another shop. The paint correction they did was remarkable — perfectly mirror-like finish. These guys know what they're doing.

author: David W.
text: Had them detail our RV before a road trip. It was filthy from sitting in the Las Vegas sun for months. They removed all the oxidation and it looks 10 years newer. Great communication too.

author: Jennifer H.
text: Super convenient — they came to my office parking lot and detailed my car while I worked. Came out to a spotless, shiny Highlander. The attention to detail is impressive.

author: Robert C.
text: Really great work on my F-150. Interior was heavily soiled from work use and they got it looking almost new. Only reason for 4 stars is I wish they had slightly earlier availability on weekends.

author: Amanda T.
text: Family-owned and it shows — they actually care about the quality. The full detail on my Audi Q7 was meticulous. Every panel, every crevice. Worth every penny.
